FOUND IN: Pancetta - salt-cured unsmoked Italian bacon that is typically thick cut and often used in recipes like pasta carbonara or risotto.
Colosseum: An iconic symbol of Imperial Rome, showcasing gladiatorial combat.
Volt (V) - a derived unit measuring electrical potential difference or voltage.

FOUND IN: The Celsius scale, also known as centigrade scale in some regions, was introduced by Anders Celsius in 1742
